1.title: Office Memo
1.body: Now that we have our new intranet system up and running I ask that you use it to send a
ny questions or documents to me. I have important work to do and cannot have you barging into my office every five minutes.

a.title: Contrato n22
a.body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

1.title: Do not Open
1.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.  Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

a.title: Contrato n22
a.body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

1.title: wtf are you kidding me?
1.body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
